org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.notification
Interface Listener<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMeanObservationTableModel, MenuBar, ObservationAndMeanPlotModel, ObservationDetailsDialog, ObservationFilterDialog, ObservationPlotModel, PeriodAnalysis2DChartPane, PeriodAnalysisDataTablePane, PhaseParameterDialog, PhasePlotMeanObservationTableModel, RawDataMeanObservationTableModel, ValidObservationTableModel
public interface Listener<T>

A listener interface genericised on the class of object that will be sent by the notifier. This is a simpler, more flexible, and more type-safe form of the Observer pattern than the one provided via the standard Java Observer/Observable framework. A good candidate for T is an enum.

Method Summary
 boolean canBeRemoved()
          Informs the caller whether this listener can be removed.
 void update(T info)
          The method that is called back by the notifier whose activities this listener is interested in.
